description: Created in 2006, Arryadia is a television channel that offers various programs to Moroccan viewers, particularly sports fans. Arryadia was launched in September 2006 and has its headquarters in Casablanca. The birth of the The channel was made within the national radio and television company which is the group of public channels in Morocco.Since its creation, the channel has aimed to satisfy sports enthusiasts by offering different programs on each discipline. live transmissions of national, regional or international competitions, it also offers Talkshows, news flashes and magazines focusing on different sports themes.
subtitle: By Channel
title: ARRYADIA SPORTS / MOROCCO
